name: The Magic Bookshop
description:
'The Magical Bookshop' is a small 3d environment I made for my game design studio course.

Though a small area I packed it full of magical objects to make it feel lived in, even if the thing living inside is a tree that cant take its eyes off of you.

Thank you for checking out my bookshop I hope you enjoyed walking around and checking out the sights. Any feedback would be amazing.

And dont forget to follow my itch as well as my twitter @Zodrodo for updates on projects aswell as progress shots of anything I might happen to be making at the time.
